plot: A documentary on the miracle which took place in the Usturt Mountains which is now a holy shrine where people go to worship.
title: Tayna Raskrytoy Ladoni
plot_es: A documentary on the miracle which took place in the Usturt Mountains which is now a holy shrine where people go to worship.
plot_en: A documentary on the miracle which took place in the Usturt Mountains which is now a holy shrine where people go to worship.
